scripts.install: concurrently "yarn --cwd host install" "yarn --cwd users install" "yarn --cwd albums install" "yarn --cwd photos install" "yarn --cwd components install"
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn --cwd host start" "yarn --cwd users start" "yarn --cwd albums start" "yarn --cwd photos start" "yarn --cwd components start"
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn --cwd host test" "yarn --cwd users test" "yarn --cwd albums test" "yarn --cwd photos test" "yarn --cwd components test"
scripts.eslint: concurrently "yarn --cwd host eslint" "yarn --cwd users eslint" "yarn --cwd albums eslint" "yarn --cwd photos eslint" "yarn --cwd components eslint"
